overview: If you liked the first volume of Crazy Weekend, you're gonna love this follow up because they're basically the same movie! Now, don't get me wrong, the first film featured beautiful Russian twinks in some hot bareback sex with multiple cumshots per scene and clocked in at almost 3 hours - not a bad formula to copy, if ya ask me. Let's hope Crazy Weekend 3 is just around the corner.
title: Crazy Weekend 2
